actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide survivorship benefits for the families of certain severely disabled veterans.

summary.text: Extends retirement and survivorship benefits authorized by law to veterans and families of veterans totally and permanently disabled as a result of service in the armed forces. Requires, in order to be eligible for such survivor benefit plan, an application within one year of the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide survivorship benefits for the families of certain severely disabled veterans.
